attributes.action: UK GOVERMENT TO STOP PROVIDING BOTH LETHAL & NON-LEATHAL WEAPONY AGAINST RUSSIA
attributes.additional_details: We as a country should have a say in this current situation, especially considering that our lives could be in danger with our involvement with the supply of serious weaponry. You choose as a government to get involved in this, but your people's lives and say MATTERS and we don't want our government in the middle of a war that could potentially put our people's lives at risk & everyone else's to. We want peace, and want all countries to hold hands and share peace and love eith one and other.
attributes.background: We want the UK Government to stop supplying Ukraine anymore UK made lethal & non-lethal weaponry against Russia. We as a country want no involvement in any conflict of war. We don't want to be a threat to any county, we are a country of acceptance for all. We want a future for our families.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Stop sending military aid to Ukraine 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702525
